Voice-activated alarm clock: An alarm clock that can be activated through voice commands, allowing users to set and snooze alarms without having to touch the device.
Smart alarm clock: An alarm clock that can be integrated with smart home devices, such as lights or coffee machines, to create a morning routine that starts with a gentle wake-up.
Customizable alarm clock: An alarm clock that allows users to customize the sound, color, and design of the clock to match their personal preferences.
Multi-functional alarm clock: An alarm clock that includes additional features such as a weather forecast, news updates, or a built-in music player.
Portable alarm clock: An alarm clock that can be taken on the go, allowing users to set and snooze alarms while traveling or working remotely.
